traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the aurochs moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d8+5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (6d8+5) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the cow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: As a bonus action, the cranium rat can shed dim light from its brain in a 5-foot radius or extinguish the light.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.text: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as i to all divination spells.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the rothé moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: The deep rothé's spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast dancing lights at will, requiring no components.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.text: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the deinonychus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The deinonychus makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6+2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the dolphin moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: The dolphin can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10+2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the ox moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Beast of Burden
traits.text: The oxen is considered to be a Huge animal for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.text: If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage to the target.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The quetzalcoatlus doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (3d6+2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the rothé moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (6d6+5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the kow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Stench
traits.text: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow must succeed on a DC 26 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature’s next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The velociraptor makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.
